# NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.default

**Case**

The default split view item behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Discussion

This behavior corresponds to split view items that you create using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitViewItem/init(viewController:)].

## Item Behaviors

- **NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.sidebar**: The sidebar behavior.
- **NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.contentList**: The content list behavior.
- **NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.inspector**: The inspector behavior.
title: NSSplitViewItem.Behavior.default
